I want to progress, I want to see the country advance, I want to see the liberties of the count un- folding and expanding; but instead o this our rulers are narrowing them down and re- stricting their free exercise. They are now proposing to take away the elective principle in its app ication to this Chamber, and that tec, without even having received a peti- tion or sign of any kind from the œople that such is their wish. If this is not a policy of retrogression I can hardly imagine what would be.
